Last Projects

Twenalizer Ukraine

Data visualization that tracks real time tweets about Ukraine and shows them on a map (right now the realtime feature is disabled in order to show the tweets collected). Technologies: NodeJS, Socket.IO and D3.js. Click here to see it.
